page.title: 41A day in the life.
page.content:
On Saturday 18th June we went to medieval day at Eltham palace. We saw a falconry display with a kestrel and an eagle.

After this we were entertained by the Jester we played lots of games and then at the end of the day we were all excited to see the jousting , hoping that the blue knight would win but he didnâ€™t he came second at the end of the day we was all very tired.


pupil-montbelle school
